title: Ban worthy?
body:
One of my friends earned a 14-day suspension for this chat logs: (take note that he has not has any other violations in the past, this is his first one ever and I’m just trying to figure out why he was punished so badly for his first “violation”)

PizzaTurtle1234: DRAVEN SPAM PINGED YOU

 Like I know he got heated and he should’ve just muted them, but they where being quite rude to him, telling him that his mother should’ve swallowed him just because he pinged the jungler’s smite as “ready” when Baron got stolen by MF ulty. Just doesn’t seem right to go straight into a 14-day suspension for this. Am I just not seeing something? I really just want to understand the reasoning behind the punishment.

replies.body:
> PizzaTurtle1234: %%%%%%
PizzaTurtle1234: i didnt say a thing
PizzaTurtle1234: %%%%%%

Anything that shows up censored like that is zero-tolerance and generally skips lower punishment tiers and goes straight to a 14-day ban.

I see, that’s interesting I didn’t know that. Still seems weird though at least to me but I understand now thank you ^^. I still feel like a little justice is deserved for the people flaming him if that’s bannable though haha
Strange though that the f-word is an autoban I didn’t know that, that’s really strange actually
It's classified as hate-speech - on the same level as racist insults.
Yeah, the f-word, the n-word, and any mention of "kys" are all zero-tolerance by riot.  First offence skips straight to a 14 day ban, second is perma.

Haha, he’s usually never toxic really, he’s usually the one to calm me down XD Sucks he got really upset this game because his mom passed away at a young age and they where insulting her so he kinda snapped. I’ll make sure to tell him though, hopefully he gets his rewards back soon because this is his first season in gold ^^
aww cause those words hurt so much.....   bet you voted for killary..
Really showing your powers of observation here buddy... News flash - foreigners can't vote on your elections. Username relevant when you don't even know how your system works.

Plot twist: the 'friend' is actually the op.
"whooooaaa"

you said something that got censored to %%%%%%
That means it was the f word, n word, 'kys' or other phrases that are on the zero tolerance list.

That's why it's justified to skip the chat restrictions and go straight to ban.
